name: Association des Producteurs Européens de Potasse
bossPosition: Managing Director of K+S KALI GmbH
goal:
The non-profit objectives of the Association shall be to interact with the European Institutions, Member States and other international organizations, especcially to

a) promote the use of the products based on or containing potash with the exception of matters of a commercial nature,
b) represent the interests of the European potash producers in the European Union,
c) defend the legitimate interests of the European potash producers against unfair trade practices and anti-competitive behaviour of third country potash producers and processors,
d) observe the safety, health and environmental legislation in the European Union and act as experienced and competent consultant.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety
euInitiatives:
- Modernization of the Trade Defense Instruments
- Amendment of the Emission Trading System 2020 to 2030, participation in the stakeholder consultation on ETS post-2020 Carbon Leakage Provisions.
- Legislation in the scope of the environment, in particular water.
- Activities within the Sectoral Social Dialogue of the Extractive Industry (SSDEI);
- Revision of the EU Fertilizer's Regulation
